feature_ecommerce_desc: Shop from our curated collection of premium products with seamless checkout and fast delivery.
feature_mlm_desc: Build your network across 12 levels and earn commissions from each level's performance.
feature_rewards_desc: Earn not just commissions but also exclusive rewards, trips, and luxury items.
feature_secure_desc: Advanced security measures to protect your data and transactions.
feature_dashboard_desc: Track your team performance, earnings, and growth with detailed analytics.
feature_payouts_desc: Get your commissions and rewards quickly with our efficient payout system.
cta_title: Ready to Transform Your Financial Future?
cta_desc: Join thousands of successful members in our thriving community
hero_description: Experience the future of e-commerce with our integrated 12-level MLM rewards system. Shop products, build your network, and earn unlimited commissions.
hero_subtitle: Your Companion in Awakening the Light Within.
about_us_description_1: At Swanand Vibes, we believe spirituality isn’t just a practice it’s a way to live with peace, balance, and purpose every day.
about_us_description_2: In today’s fast-paced world, stress, anxiety, and uncertainty are constant companions. We help you reconnect with your inner calm through authentic spiritual guidance and sacred tools, bringing ancient wisdom into modern life.
mission_desc: To make spirituality accessible to everyone — helping you bring positive energy, harmony, and clarity into your daily life.
spiritual_companions_desc: Whether you’re seeking calmness, clarity, or spiritual growth, our collection of sacred tools are more than objects they are companions that enhance peace, stability, and energy in your life.
importance_of_crystals_desc: Crystals have been revered for centuries for their unique energy and vibrations. They are believed to help balance energy, support emotional wellbeing, and foster spiritual growth. When used mindfully, crystals can become powerful allies in connecting with your inner self and creating harmony in your life.
vision_desc_1: Swanand Vibes bridges ancient spiritual practices and modern life, spreading guidance, awareness, and positive energy for everyone.
vision_desc_2: We believe every individual carries a divine spark. With the right tools, guidance, and intention, this spark can illuminate your path toward joy, abundance, and spiritual fulfillment.
vision_tagline: Swanand Vibes Your Companion in Awakening the Light Within.
integrity_desc: We offer only authentic spiritual tools and guidance with full transparency.
growth_desc: We’re here to support your inner journey wherever you are on your path.
innovation_desc: We blend ancient traditions with modern practices to suit today’s world.
community_desc: We foster a supportive space for spiritual seekers to connect and grow together.
contact_subtitle: We’d love to hear from you. Contact us for questions, support, or partnership opportunities.
contact_info_text: Fill out the form or contact us directly using the information below.
